data.title: Celebrate Brad Pitt's Birthday by Remembering the Star's Best Roles
data.meta_description: From Once Upon a Time...in Hollywood to throwbacks like his debut in Thelma and Louise, Brad Pitt has thankfully been on the big screen for nearly thirty years.
data.text: Watch : Brad Pitt Doesn't Want to Be at the "Ad Astra" Premiere It's been a huge year for Brad Pitt! The Oscar-winning actor, who turns 56 today, is closing out 2019 having produced or starred in some of the most memorable movies of the year, including a few that have already garnered awards buzz. On-screen, the performer wowed audiences when he partnered up with fellow A-lister Leonardo Dicapio for Quentin Tarantino's Once Upon a Time...in Hollywood. The star is nominated for Best Performance by an Actor in a Supporting Role in Any Motion Picture at the Golden Globes for his portrayal, and the film got some love too with a nod for Best Motion Picture—Musical or Comedy. That wasn't the only time the celebrity graced the silver screen, either. Pitt also starred in Ad Astra, a drama set in outer space that received wide praise from critics. While we love the actor for his abilities to embody any character, he's also a bonafide producer, with his company Plan B Entertainment having produced The Last Black Man in San Francisco, which saw its debut at Sundance, and The King starring Timothée Chalamet. Pitt has been influential in front of and behind the camera for nearly three decades and has received wide recognition for his work. In fact, on Thursday, the Producer's Guild of America announced that Pitt, along with his producing partners Dede Gardner and Jeremy Kleiner, will be receiving the David O. Selznick Achievement Award at the organization's award ceremony this upcoming January. To celebrate one of our favorite actors, and arguably one of the last true movie stars, we've rounded up some of his best roles to date. Check out the many characters Pitt has played and then sound off on which is your favorite! Poll Brad Pitt's Best Roles Which of Brad Pitt's roles is your favorite? J.D. in Thelma & Louise J.D. in Thelma & Louise 1.9 % Floyd in True Romance Floyd in True Romance 1 % Louis de Pointe du Lac in Interview with the Vampire Louis de Pointe du Lac in Interview with the Vampire 2.9 % Detective David Mills in Se7en Detective David Mills in Se7en 4.8 % Jeffrey Goines in 12 Monkeys Jeffrey Goines in 12 Monkeys 4.8 % Tyler Durden in Fight Club Tyler Durden in Fight Club 20 % Will Colbert in Friends Will Colbert in Friends 3.8 % "Rusty" Ryan in the Ocean's franchise "Rusty" Ryan in the Ocean's franchise 12.4 % Achilles in Troy Achilles in Troy 9.5 % John Smith in Mr. & Mrs. Smith John Smith in Mr. & Mrs. Smith 12.4 % Aldo Raine in Inglorious Basterds Aldo Raine in Inglorious Basterds 3.8 % Billy Beane in Moneyball Billy Beane in Moneyball 3.8 % Gerry Lane in World War Z Gerry Lane in World War Z 1.9 % Don "Wardaddy" Collier in Fury Don "Wardaddy" Collier in Fury 1 % Ben Ricket in The Big Short Ben Ricket in The Big Short 1 % Cliff Booth in Once Upon a Time...in Hollywood Cliff Booth in Once Upon a Time...in Hollywood 13.3 % Roy McBride in Ad Astra Roy McBride in Ad Astra 1.9 %
